answers.answer: What is a 24 hour urine test?
A test where u take a jug home & have to collect ur urine for 24hrs then send it back to the lab
What does it determine? Sorry just curious. I've never heard of it before.
Oh:/ I'm sorry momma!!! I hope everything goes well for you!
Thanks :) I pray nothing is wrong!!
Are you retaining a lot of fluid and feet swell really bad?
Its to help to see what they can do to prevent preclamsiea I think I did it.
Nope no swelling or retaining any water

I did it. My bp was high w my 1st & I had complications during labor. For me they did it to see what my levels for everything are at when I have a normal bp incase it goes up again they know what I am supposed to be at. they also did an ekg. But better safe then sorry!! Don't be nervous I'm sure everything will be just fine
I had to do a 24hour urine test with my routine prenatal blood work. I think they said it was to check my kidneys and such.

question: Okay I'm 17w4d & I'm having to do the 24hr urine test! I'm getting hella nervous about my results & reading that other moms had to b induced & just thinking the worst of worst right nowBut my doc is doing it cuz my BP has been in the 140ish/80-60ish every time I go into the doc. But it drops to the low 130's after they recheck it...my BP is normally low 130's to 120's over 70's or 80's so idk I can't afford to b on bed rest & not work & I always seem to think the worst when it comes to anything that could go wrong cuz it normally does...just feeling scared & lost on this issue...just wanna cry!
title: 24hr urine test
